mapper.select:
select sell_number, ps.pro_number, pro_name, sell_price, sell_score, sell_contents, sell_contents, sell_total , sell_date, sell_title, sell_thumbnail, sell_quantity, ps.mem_ID, option_yn, pro_division, common_name, substr(common_code,0,4) bigc ,(select common_name from commonlist where common_code = substr(pro_division,0,4)) bign
from productsell ps, product p ,commonlist cl where ps.pro_number = p.pro_number and p.pro_division = cl.common_code and sell_number = ${p_id}

select sell_number, option_size, option_color, option_quantity
from selloption where sell_number = ${p_id} order by to_number(option_size)
select sell_number, sell_thumbnail, sell_title, sell_price from( select * from productsell ) where rowNum < 17 order by sell_date
select pro_name from product where pro_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by pro_name

select p.sell_number, p.sell_thumbnail, p.sell_title, p.sell_price, p.sell_date, p.mem_ID, p2.pro_name from productsell p, product p2 where p.pro_number = p2.pro_number and sell_title like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' and pro_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' order by sell_date
